name: 8 Tins Of Frisolac Gold Stage 1
description:
Client is a mother of 7 (F/15, F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/5 mths). 
Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/5 mths. 
Client was previously unable to work due to gestational hypertension, and presently, she is the primary caregiver for the newborn. 
In addition, she underwent a cesarean section (c-section) when she gave birth on 30th August 2021, and is currently unable to do strenuous activities. Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day. As such, the family are limited in their financial resources. 
They are also in need of milk powder for their 5 mths old baby. 
Looking for a kind donor who is willing to donate. 
Thank you.

name: Paints For House
description:
Our client is experiencing homelessness and was residing at a S3P shelter for the past 6-7 months. 
He has received his keys for his rental flat in Dec 2021. However, due to the financial situation (i.e. getting a new full-time job with the new housing stability), he would require support for basic household items to support his family's shift into the new rental flat.
Thank you.
specifications: Plain White x 1 Tin , Grey x 2 Tins

name: 1 Foldable Mattress 2 Pillows  2 Bolsters
description: We appealing for 1 foldable mattress 2 pillows 2 Bolsters for a low income family who is struggling financially and on assistance  which make difficult for them to purchase the  items on their own WE SEEK FURTHER  ASSISTANCE TO HELP IN THE TRANSPORTATION OR SPONSER THE TRANSPORTATION COST

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: OFFICE CHAIR WITH NECK REST
description:
We are appealing  for a 
OFFICE CHAIH NEXK EST for a low income family who needs this item for study chair due to their financial status they cannot afford to purchase  one on their own

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Maggie Gan

name: Kitchen Cabiet
description: Malay family of 8 living in 2-room rental flat, with only 1 breadwinner in the house, requires a kitchen cabinet as current one is hardly holding up. Family hopes to have a stable kitchen cabinet to hold the items as this would help free up space in the house.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Choa Chu Kang
contact.name: Adeline Choo

name: Single Mattress
description: We are working with HDB for a pilot project HDB Joint Single Scheme to house single elderly individuals. We have all the basic amenities but not mattresses, pillows and blankets as it is expected that the residents need to get on their own expense. However, most of the residents coming in are little to no income and not able to afford. Hence, any donations for new mattresses, pillows or blankets are welcome. Multiple donors are welcome. we need about 200 pcs of each urgently.

name: Kitchen Cabinet For 2-3 Rooms Flat
description:
Client is a mother of one, aged 16 years old. 
She is also the caregiver of her 2 elderly parents, whom her mother is bedridden and her father has stage 4 cancer, as well as her sister, who has diabetes. 
Due to the multiple financial commitments, she and her husband are unable to afford a new kitchen cabinet. Their current kitchen cabinet is faulty.

name: Step ladder
description: Client is a single mother to 3 children, having left her marriage. She is also the sole breadwinner for the family, and not receiving support from ex-husband. Client had just gotten a HDB rental unit for her and her children, and are keen to move in, and start anew. However, she does not have the means to get the necessary furniture, as her salary goes towards the basic necessities for the family. (Kamie/Faridah)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: 4 door wardrobe
description: Client is a single mother to 3 children, having left her marriage. She is also the sole breadwinner for the family, and not receiving support from ex-husband. Client had just gotten a HDB rental unit for her and her children, and are keen to move in, and start anew. However, she does not have the means to get the necessary furniture, as her salary goes towards the basic necessities for the family. (Kamie/Faridah)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Ikea KALLAX Cubicle Shelving Unit (Black)
description: Low income family of 9 staying in a 1 room rental unit. 2 of the older children have started primary school and there is no proper storage for their school bags, books and family's clothes. Due to the space constraint, having a cubicle shelving unit will declutter the house and allow independence training for children to safekeep their things in the assigned cubicle.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Choa Chu Kang
contact.name: Claire Koh

name: Window Grilles
description:
The family experiences some financial difficulties as client is the sole breadwinner of the family and the high cost of education for eldest daughter who is on student pass currently. 
Given that there are two young children below the age of 3, the lack of window grilles pose as a safety hazard and the family hopes to source for kind donors to request for window grilles.

name: Kitchen cabinet
description:
Client is a young mother with 6 young and school-going children. Kitchen cabinet is needed to allow mother to have better organisation of her home and better storage of her appliances so to keep her children safe in the kitchen. 

Prefer a kitchen cabinet that has drawers and waterproof (plastic material).

name: 3-door wardrobe
description: Single mother has 2 daughters. They need a wardrobe (size of 3 to 4 doors) as theirs has spoilt and they are unable to afford a new one. Mother works multiple part-time jobs and earns only enough to support daily expenses.

name: 10-door Wardrobe
description: Clt is a single mother with four children in a one-room rental flat. She had brought them up singlehandedly without any support from her ex-husband and is supporting three of her children's ITE education by doing parcel delivery. Dimension listed is an estimation.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Muhammad Danial Bin Mazlan

name: Wardobe
description:
Please WhatsApp me at 8388 7562.
Dear Donor, we have 2 elderly gentlemen above 65 who managed to get an HDB rental unit after several decades. This is going to be their fixed accomodation for the golden period of their lives. Hope you could assist them with several items as housewarming gifts. Donors, please assist to cover the cost of transport. - 2 door wardrobe - Induction Cooker - Microwave oven - Rice Cooker - kitchen cabinet (movable) Donors, please assist to cover the cost of transport. Thank you very much for your kind donation.

name: Paint
description: Client is a divorced mother who stays in a 2-room rental flat with her three sons. Client has depression and earns a low income due to her low educational qualifications. Client is looking to repaint her house and hopes she can receive donation for paint.

name: Wardrobe
description: Client is looking for a sliding 2 door wardrobe to put her clothes in. Her current wardrobe is not working well and there is limited space in her current flat. Hence, she would prefer a sliding wardrobe to save space in her room.

name: Wardrobe for clothes
description: Client is a single mother with 2 young children (9/F and 5/M). Clientâ€™s spouse passed away early 2020.The family does not have their own home and were staying at open market rental, but due to financial struggle and caregiving needs by client, she applied for HDB public rental unit.HDB recently assigned a public rental unit to her, and she needs support with basic furnishing and electrical appliances. She hopes to seek help for wardrobe. For further liaison, do contact Nurul via whatsapp at 98598767.

name: Kitchen Tabletop
description: The family has recently relocated into their HDB flat. They would appreciate for a donated TV console as they prioritise expenses on their other needs.

name: Laptop
description: Please WhatsApp Debera at 8855 3078 during office hours or email to deberatan@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Client is a single mother to her 7-year-old son. Client is currently unemployed but attending courses to upgrade her skills so that she can get a better paying job after. Recently, client received a good news that she has been shortlisted for the Management Trainee program. As her laptop has stopped working, she had to resort to using her phone to go for the courses. However, some assignments requires client to use a laptop instead. This caused client to have to reschedule some of her courses and will eventually decrease her efficiency and motivation to work to earn money for her family.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Laptop
description:
Requesting for a laptop for a 10 year old boy so that he could have access for ZOOM as his current laptop has spoilt. 

His mother has recently passed away and he is currently staying together with his father in the rental flat. Father recently started working and is earning $600/month. Family is struggling to make ends meet as mother used to be the sole breadwinner.

name: 2 laptops (can be secondhand)
description: Low-income family has 2 daughters who need laptops for school and work purposes. One daughter is an adult but has difficulty securing employment due to mental health issues but is willing to learn new skills and work on skills upgrading in the meantime. Another daughter is a teenager who is due to start school and requires a laptop for academic purposes. Their elderly father is sole breadwinner who is also supporting his elderly parents residing in the same household. Mother has been largely absent and does not financially contribute to the family. Laptops for the 2 daughters will be a great support for them.

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother and just gave birth. Client would like to request a laptop so she is able to do some part-time online job while providing care to her baby. Thank you. (Xin Mo)

description: Client (F/32) requested assistance on laptop for her 4 children's educational use as well as for participation in our FSC's monthly program which is conducted online via Zoom platform. Family's current laptop have numerous technical malfunctions and no longer in use. Donation of a laptop (new or functioning 2nd hand) would be greatly appreciated!

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Laptop
description: A single mother in her 20s requires a functioning laptop for her work as well as for her online courses. She has recently gained employment but is still financially struggling. A donated laptop will assist her in managing her online tasks.

name: Laptop
description: Client requires a laptop for her husband who needs it for a course he's attending to upgrade himself. Family is unable to afford purchasing one due to tight financial situation.

name: Laptop
description: Client is a single mother caring for her school going child. She is working from home and her laptop is wearing out, making it difficult for her to do her administrative work. She is requesting for a new or 2nd hand laptop replacement.

description:
Young adult with mild ID is currently doing her part-time studies in digital animation at the ITE. She requires a laptop for her school work. Young adult is residing and taken care by her grandparents who are no longer working.

Min specifications required to support the necessary educational software: Processor: Intel(R) Core (TM) i7-8550U CPU @ 1.80GHz 1.99 GHz RAM: 16GB System type: 64-bit operating system, x64-based processer Software: Windows 10

name: Tena Diapers
description:
Client has terminal illness and very short prognosis. Due to his medical condition, he is now requiring diapers. Client is in financial need as he has been unemployed for several years and savings have been depleting. Family is not contributing to his medical related expenses.  
Client will benefit from about 105 pieces of diapers for next 3 weeks (he uses about 5 pieces a day). Kindly contact me at my work mobile at 84282545.

name: Groceries
description:
Family background: Client is currently not working as she has anxiety issues. Husband recently underwent abscess surgery last quarter, and has been trying to find stable work. She requires assistance with her daily basic needs such as food.

The items which would benefit the beneficiary includes:

-Tidbits for the kids like potato chip or oreo,
-Tau kwa,
-Tempeh(soya bean cake),
-Round cabbage,
-Fish nuggets,
-Bibik's Chicken crispy katsudon 1kg,
-Rice,
-Bread,
-Egg.

name: Food ration

name: Food Rations
description: Client is suffering from long term mental health issues and had recently lost his job. He is estranged from his family for 20yrs. The stress of unemployment and inability to sustain himself is further impacting his mental health condition. He is seeking food ration assistance for 2mth supply while he continues to search for jobs.

name: Groceries
description:
Client is  a father of two, and is undergoing a divorce, and also facing more than one medical procedures within this month.
As he is a self-employed taxi driver, during his recovery period, he would not be able to earn any income, and would run into difficulties meeting his basic needs, and taking care of his children.

As such, client would benefit from fresh rations such as fresh meat and whole foods which are nutritious for his recovery and for his children.

Grocery list:
Fresh Meat -3kg (chicken, fish)
Rice - 10kg,
Condiments(salt, pepper, soy sauce)
Cooking oil - 1 litre,
Biscuits/Crackers,
Bread and spread (butter and jam),
Diapers
Milk (ISOMIL stage 3 & FRISOGOLD stage 4)
Soap & Shampoo
Toothpaste
Toilet rolls.

description: Client is an elderly widow with no children. She has multiple medical conditions, including an autoimmune disease. She is wheelchair-bound, and requires diapers at night, as well as when she goes for her rehab sessions and medical appointments.

However, client is concerned about leaving her unsupervised at home when she resumes work as she brings home her friends daily. Due to their financial constraints, client has not been able to purchase a small CCTV camera as a safety precaution. A donation of a small CCTV camera will be greatly appreciated. Thank you. (Liyana)

#01-233, Singapore 760107. Please contact us for arranging a delivery via mobile at 9436 7401 or email at dik@childrensociety.org.sg. Thank you!

name: Wheelchair
description: 2 wheelchairs required urgently for inmates with mobility issues (i.e. stroke and lower limb weakness respectively) who are slated for release soon. They would require wheelchairs to move about.

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Service - Family Resource Centre
contact.name: Janet Liam Hui Hui

name: Detachable wheelchair
description: Patient, 53 years old  is divorced with 2 children (F/26, M/19). He is diagnosed with Stroke and admitted at Alexandra Hospital for rehabilitation.Patient would require detachable wheelchair(18

name: Electric Scooter
description: Low Income beneficiary with health problem has been unable to land a suitable job. He is working as a deliveryman with a bicycle but is unable to go long distances due to his health issue. Would like to request for a e scooter that will help him able to get more jobs to better support his basic needs. E scooter brand requested is Jimove Model (MC)

name: Adult Bicycle + 2x children bicycles with training wheels
description: Client is the sole breadwinner of her family, with 6 children, and is currently undergoing a divorce. She is front-line worker in a hospital, and has little time to spend with her children due to her job responsibilities. 4 of her children who are under 7 years old have voiced out that they want to learn cycling, and she would like to bring them out to learn cycling as a family bonding activity. She currently do not own any bicycles of her own, and hence would like to request for one adult bicycle of her own, and at least 2 children bicycle with training wheels for her children to share.
specifications: Adult Bicycle should fit a lady
